name: PIX Easy
description: Indoor switchgear with withdrawable EasyPact EXE vacuum circuit breaker, up to 2500A, 31.5 kA , providing high level of safety, simplicity to use and strong reliability.

features.name: Safety
features.description:
•Fully type tested according to latest IEC standards for 50 and 60 Hz 
 • Internal arc tested up to 31.5 kA with AFLR 
 • Full metal partition PM class switchgear 
 • Mechanical and electrical interlock embeded to address operator safety

features.name: Efficiency
features.description: Compact dimensions start with a 600mm wide cubicle for ratings up to 1250A and a 800mm wide cubicle for ratings up to 2500A, for up to 17.5 kV rated voltage

features.name: Reliability
features.description:
• Maximizing service continuity to minimize down time thanks to LSC-2B IEC classification 
 • Busbar segregation between cubicles (option) 
 • It is designed for 30 years life time with respect of installation, operations and environmental conditions

products.name: ARC Flash Relay
products.description: The VAMP 300 series offers a comprehensive family of protection and control devices with versatile measurement functions for the management of feeders, motors, generators and transformers.

features.name: Complete protection for feeders and motors
features.description: Comprehensive selection of protection functions for distribution network overhead lines, cable feeders and motors.

features.name: Ultra-fast arc protection
features.description: The unique integrated arc fault functionality adds a new dimension to the total safety of the installation and the reliability of the protection and control system. Interface a maximum of 6 point sensors or 1 fibre loop and 4 point sensors to extend the protection scheme to a new dimension with 2 ms tripping time.

features.name: Total control
features.description: Extensive bay control functionality including local and remote control of 6 objects and status supervision of another 2 objects. Easy-to-use ON – OFF buttons for select – execute control of circuit breaker.

features.name: Comprehensive measurements
features.description: A range of measurement functions including phase and residual currents, residual, line or phase voltage, frequency, current imbalance, maximum demand, negative phase sequence current, active and reactive power and energy according to the primary connection.

features.name: Power quality analysis
features.description: Power quality analysis includes supervision of harmonics up to the 15th order, THD of currents and voltage as well as voltage sag and swell.

features.name: Full recording features
features.description: Following a fault, the relays provide upto 2000 event sequence recordings, fault value registration and disturbance recordings.

features.name: Programmable protection stages
features.description: Including overcurrent, overvoltage, undervoltage, earth fault and frequency protection.

features.name: Extensive communication
features.description: A large number of supported communication protocols are included: IEC 60870-5-101, IEC 60870-5-103, Modbus TCP, Modbus RTU, Profibus DP, TCP/IP, SPA-bus slave, DNP 3.0 and IEC 61850.

products.name: ASCO 7000 Series IEC MVATS
products.description: ASCO power products are designed for robust, intelligent, and advanced power transfer and control with extensive diagnostic capabilities. The 7000 SERIES Medium Voltage Transfer Switch provides continuous power in the widest range of emergency and standby power applications including healthcare, industrial, commercial, and business-critical campuses and facilities.

features.name: Range Overview
features.description:
• Medium Voltage ATS Ranging from 3.3kV, 6.6kV, 7.2kV, 11kV, 13.8kV 
 • Current Rating - 630A, 800A, 1250A, 2000A, 2500A

features.name: Unique Features
features.description:
• Automatic switching and source control equipment conforming to the IEC 62271-200 standard. 
 • Three innovative sections : Normal Source Circuit Breaker section (Grid Incomer), Emergency Source Circuit Breaker section (Generator Incomer), and Load feeder section. 
 • Transition Type: Delayed or Closed 
 • Internal Arc Classification:  AFLR Up to 31.5kA for 1 second

features.name: ASCO Group5 Controller
features.description:
• ASCO’s 7000 Series Controller provides all of the voltage, frequency, control, timing, and diagnostic functions required for most emergency and standby power applications 
 • 5170 Communication Module unlocks critical power data 
 • Metered Parameters - Voltages (LL/LN) & Current, Unbalance (V & I), Power (kW, kVA & kVAR) & Power Factor, Energy (kWh, kVAh & kVARh), Total Harmonic Distortion (%), kW Demand, Engine Run Time, Min/Max Historical Values

products.name: EasyPacT EXE
products.description: EasyPactEXE is a range of vacuum circuit breakers designed to connect building infrastructure (heating, ventilation, or lighting.) and industrial plant processes (MV motors, MV/LV substations, or furnaces) to the power grid, and protects your people and equipment.

features.name: Range Overview
features.description:
It enables the panel builder to design fixed and withdrawable type switchgear solutions with enhanced safety features, complete control from a separate room, and with the following technical characteristics: 
 • Rated voltage 7,2/12kV-17,5kV 
 • Rated short-circuit breaking current: 20kA-25kA-31,5kA 
 • Rated normal current: 630A-800A-1250A-1600A-2000A-2500A.

products.name: Earthing Switch
products.description: The integrated earth switch with fault making capacity makes it possible to earth the cables or the Busbar (depending on the cubicle) and ensures safety during maintenance. As per IEC 62271-102 the integrated earth switch is E1 M0 Class.Earthing switch making capacity 82kA(peak)

products.name: Climate sensor
products.description: It is a wireless sensor that enables the continuous environmental condition monitoring of an enclosure (de-energised surface) such as a switchgear cabinet. The measurement features both the temperature of the surface in contact and the relative humidity.

features.name: Unique Features
features.description:
• Continuous environmental monitoring allows users of MV and LV switchgear to optimise predictive maintenance by avoiding conditions of deterioration due to moisture and pollution. 
 •It is battery-powered and allows simple fixing on magnetic metal surfaces thanks to its high-strength magnets.
 • The sensors contribute to EcoStruxure architectures, either on cloud or on premises to deliver a truly intelligent condition-based maintenance advisor for reduced risk, continuity of service, and maintenance optimisation.

products.name: Thermal sensor
products.description: Easergy TH110 is a wireless sensor that enables the continuous thermal condition monitoring of all the critical connections made on the field, such as: cables, withdrawable Circuit Breakers (CB)

features.name: Unique Features
features.description:
• Compliance to Standard : IEC 61010:2010+A1:2016 (UL 61010 -1 2012) 
 • 52kV Voltage Operations 
 • 5000A Current Operations without exceeding the temperature rise limits 
 • Easergy TH110 is self-powered by the network current. Temperature data is sent via Zigbee wireless communication to provide high performance and accurate thermal monitoring, can replace the need of periodic infrared scanning.                     4. Zigbee Green power at 2.4 GHz according to IEEE 802.15.4

products.name: FE Logboook
products.description: The digital logbook is an easy to use collaborative tool that keeps record of important documentation and maintenance schedules. With EcoStruxure Power from Schneider Electric, you can offer your customers the cutting-edge, end-to-end digital solutions they are looking for to make their buildings more efficient and reliable. The digital logbook can be initiated by a panel builder using EcoStruxure Power Commission during switchboard construction.
